vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates June 8, 2023, as National Seersucker Day. The resolution also designates Seersucker Thursday and Seersucker Appreciation Month.
Further, the resolution (1) recognizes the contributions of the hard-working people of the United States through the wearing of seersucker, the warm weather clothing known as the working person's uniform; and (2) encourages local governments to partner with local organizations and other members of the clothing industries and enthusiasts to promote the wearing of seersucker.
